member.name: T:Telerik.Sitefinity.Frontend.Taxonomies.Mvc.Models.HierarchicalTaxonomy.TaxaViewModelTreeBuilder
member.summary: A helper class that creates trees of taxon view models that represents the taxa hierarchy. It allows filtering of the taxa that should be included in the trees.

Creates trees of view models that represents the hierarchy of the given taxa. A method delegate for creating a taxon view model should be provided. If the method returns null, the taxon won't be included in the tree. The taxa hierarchy is traversed in a breadth-first manner so the ordering of the taxa in each level is preserved.
member.param: A method that creates a taxon view model by given taxon. If null is returned, the taxon won't be included in the tree.
The taxonomy manager that will be used to retrieve the children.
The maximum number of taxa that will be included in the tree.

member.name: P:Telerik.Sitefinity.Frontend.Taxonomies.Mvc.Models.HierarchicalTaxonomy.TaxaViewModelTreeBuilder.TaxonData.Taxon
member.summary: Gets or sets the taxon that is currently examined.

member.summary: Gets or sets the last known parent in the newly constructed tree.
